Title: FLOSS Weekly 719: Let the Wiki Win! - Peter Kaminski, Decentralized vs Centralized, Massive Wiki
Description:
Pete Kaminski joins Doc Searls and Dan Lynch for a deep wikis (especially his Massive one), how AI helps us collaborate spatially in the natural versus the connected worlds. Great conversations covering many topics beyond wikis.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Dan Lynch

Guest: Peter Kaminski

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly
